content: this scarf and wrap pattern has a distinctive geometric lace pattern mixed with solid stripes it can be made in two ways as a typical scarf or wider and longer to work as a shoulder wrap to drape around you on cooler summer nights while you can choose to use any yarn the pattern was designed to use hobbii seashell yarn or hobbii olivin yarn the pattern is written in us crochet terms with both photos and written instructions and also has a video tutorial available on youtube here 1 pattern also available on payhip here 2 level upper beginner yardage scarf 4 x 50 g balls 680 yards/ 625 metres wrap 6 x 50g balls 984 yards/ 900 metres scarf 4 - 5 balls 680 yards / 625 metres wrap 6 balls 984 yards / 900 metres gauge 17 sts x 16 row / 4 x 4 crochet hook 3 5 mm 1 https //youtu be/n9_33g_l_be 2 https //payhip com/b/4tcqi
